HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Besplatna dostava za narudžbe veće od 39,99 €. Za kupce s područja grada Zagreba, dostava je besplatna za narudžbe veće od 24,99 € vlastitim vozilom tvrtke.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2 - 4 radna dana (subota, nedjelja i neradni dani isključeni)
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Otoke koje ne pokriva dostavna mreža GLS-a dostavu paketa preuzima kurirska služba Hrvatska pošta d.o.o. Raspored dostava na otoke može se provjeriti na linku sa službene web stranice GLS Croatia d.o.o.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.free_delivery_limit: Besplatna dostava za narudžbe veće od 39,99 €.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Centralno skladište u Dugom Selu, Trnošćica 10, 10 370 Dugo Selo, radnim danom od 7 h do 17 h.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery, parcel locker delivery, and in-store pickup. 
PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by GLS, with Hrvatska pošta covering islands. BOX NOW is used for parcel lockers, and the company uses its own vehicle for deliveries in Zagreb. 
PRICING: Home delivery via GLS costs €4.00 for orders up to €39.99 and is free for orders above that amount. Parcel locker delivery via BOX NOW costs €1.99 for orders up to €39.99 and is free for orders above. In-store pickup is available at no specified cost. 
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery time is 2-4 working days, excluding weekends. Island deliveries are handled by a different provider (Hrvatska pošta) and may have a different schedule. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: A lower free shipping threshold of €24.99 is offered for customers in Zagreb who opt for delivery by the company's own vehicle. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is comprehensively detailed within the 'Uvjeti kupnje' (Terms of Purchase) page. All necessary details regarding providers, pricing, delivery times, and special conditions are present, though spread across several paragraphs. The information is clear and sufficient for a customer to make an informed decision.
